title: Xiaomi Pad 5 comes to India at an attractive price
content:
The tablet market has largely been dominated by the Apple iPad, and for good reason. Android tablet releases have been few and far in between, and it’s just Samsung and to some extent Lenovo dominating the space. More recently, we’re seeing interest from more hardware players, with Xiaomi launching the Xiaomi Pad 5 series in

The post Xiaomi Pad 5 comes to India at an attractive price appeared first on XDA.
description: Xiaomi is also bringing its Xiaomi Pad 5 tablet to India, presenting consumers another option in the Android tablet market. Check it out!
